effects.display_string: Set: Your healing spells have a chance to apply Insurance! to their targets that heals them for 653,441 over 15 sec. Insurance! is consumed if an ally drops below 40% health to heal them for 280,966.
Set: Divine Toll applies Insurance! to allies it heals for 8 sec. Divine Toll's cooldown is reduced by 1.0 sec each time you spend Holy Power.

name: 85-Year Tenure Ring
description: A small token awarded by the BEE.E.O. to those who dedicate their entire lives to service.

spells.description: Equip: Your abilities have a chance to call an earthen ally to your aid, supporting you in combat.
Use: Summon a Bursting Lightspawn which sacrifices its health to unleash Bursts of Light, inflicting 615,132 Holy damage split between nearby enemies every 2 sec while it lives. (2 Min Cooldown)
Equip: Your gear cools with Woven Duskthread and gains 756 Versatility when over 80% health.
